text: Kare-ra (iju-sha, enjo-sha) no nochi ni kita-sha-tachi wa,(inotte) `omo yo, watashi-tachi to, watashi-tachi izen ni shinko ni haitta kyodai-tachi o, o yurushi kudasai. Shinko shite iru mono ni taisuru urami kokoro o, watashi-tachi no mune no naka ni mota senaide kudasai. Omo yo, hontoni anata wa, shinsetsude jihibukaku ara remasu.' To iu
